Test Name: Osteogenesis Imperfecta and Bone Fragility Gene Panel
Purpose: To detect pathogenic genetic variants associated with Osteogenesis Imperfecta and other bone fragility disorders using next-generation sequencing.
Container: EDTA blood tube or sterile tissue container
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), PCR thermal cycler, Agilent TapeStation/Bioanalyzer
